summary:
This mod adds new standalone eye styles (not replacer) for all none-beast races.
Two different eye packs are included.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://imgur.com/ySgZoXC][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ySgZoXC.png[/IMG][/URL]


This mod adds 14 new high resolution eyes for your character. New textures are supported by all none-beast female races. 
But you can try to use this eyes with other custom races (cause they are based on classic races). If it doesn\'t work, please, write me and I\'ll try to reduce problems if it will be really necessary.


ALso mod can change word \"Nord\" in race menu (some users have reported me about this).  Unfortunately, I can not reduce this problem because of script language. However, I don think that changing of some words is a crime (by the way, all nexus mods replace nemaes and marks in my game version too =/)
Anyway, I\'m sorry for this little error.
===========
UPDATE

\"Bizarre\" Eyes Pack added
===========

===========
Instalation
===========

~ Extract files into your DATA folder
~ Don\'t forget to mark mod in launcher



===========
NOTE(!!!)
===========


I tested new eyes with SKSE and Precache Killer (many graphic mods like to crush my game in racemenu window), so it\'s hard to predict behavior of modification on your computer.Thereby I advise you to keep on hand the programs I\'ve mentioned.


===========
P.S.
===========

Please, if you find any errors, inform me rapidly. I\'ll try to reduce problems as fast as I can.


Hope you\'ll enjoy this little modification.
Also you are free to upload your screenshots with \"new eyes\" here. I\'ll be glad to look at them ;)
author: redtox
